attributes.review: This app is horrible. It took me weeks to download and all it does is take up space on my phone. He is also trying to take away an app that I spend my whole day on. This cannot happen.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I am a trump supporter so once i found out trump has an app i got excited and downloaded it. Soon after downloading i realized it is actually a platform for a racist, homophobic and sexist person. 100% do not recommend
attributes.title: VERY hard to use

attributes.review: I’m really sad to say this but honestly just delete this app, it’s so glitchy and I can’t even open the app! Also when I try to go in the app it literally TURNS OFF MY PHONE, anyways I think this app should just be deleted🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕👋
attributes.title: Delete this app 🙄

attributes.review: i got this app to keep up with my president. the moment i opened the app, i was immediately electrocuted. i figured it was my phone, so i got it on my ipad and the same thing happened. also, the app told me to kill all poc. i am disgusted. DO NOT GET. i no longer like 🍊.
attributes.title: NO

attributes.review: After the app taking weeks to download as soon as it downloaded my phone started to glitch but it wasn’t normal the glitch had different colors shooting out at me the colors were red white and blue 😡
attributes.title: The worst app

attributes.review: This app is horrible it takes so long to download when you don’t have WiFi and it has offensive things on the app it’s self it hurts to see that like I can’t take it anymore sorry trump
attributes.title: sorry trump

attributes.review: This app took a week to download when I opened it it sent seven different viruses on my phone Made my phone glitch everyone got my information it was sold on the dark Apple remove this app
attributes.title: App broke my phone

attributes.review: This app did not work well and left bugs and viruses in my phone. It does not function well, and kept braking. It then started poisoning people with racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and sexist viewpoints. It should never be downloaded for safety purposes. 0/10 very bad
attributes.title: Honest Review 🧚‍♀️🧞‍♀️🧚🏿

attributes.review: When I got this app it gave a virussss I kept seeing this orange looking thing and it was so horrible this app messed with my head so bad I had nightmares of that orange looking thing my cat accidentally saw it and for days it was sick and throwing up . THIS APP SHOULD BE REMOVED!
attributes.title: 🚨gave my phone a virus 🚨

attributes.review: It took a week to download and when I first opened the app it would black out and then power my phone off and ever since I downloaded the app I have been getting emails from the president! 100% UNWANTED
attributes.title: Complete trash
